r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added support for <token> (Christian) - Added support for <simplesect> (Richard Q, Nilgun) - Improved support for <tag> classes (Christian) - Improved support for <variablelist> (Nilgun) - Updated translations: * Danish (Kalle) * Swedish (Kalle) * Turkish (Nilgun)
